name: One Big Party.
description:
Welcome to One Big Party!

Challenge yourself and friends across 4 different mini-games, and see who will come out on top!

And don't forget to choose your team! Will it be the Glorious Reds? The Unyielding Yellows? The Cunning Greens? Or perhaps the Mysterious Purples...?

One Big Party. was created for the 40th GMC Jam in 96 hours
Made by Shortbread and Gizmo199
